Title: Best DSLR for the $$$
Comments: I have 3 friends who all own this camera and have borrowed it for a cople times.  Nice sharp images and you gotta love the interchangle canon lense system.  Only falt I give it is the plastic body, doesnt feel tough.   The price is comming down due to the Canon Rebel XT (350D) anounced in February

Title: Canon Rebel Camera
Comments: This is a great camera if you have an original ( 35 MM ) Canon Rebel and want to use the original canon lenses to go digital. Don't forget to get a 256 or better compact flash card when you buy the camera because it comes with no card at all. As usual newegg will not let you down.

Title: Good buy
Comments:
This is definately a consumer level camera, but not one to be scoffed at for that reason.  Depending on what you need it for, this camera is just as good as the 10D.  Main perk to buying the 10D is that it's more professional, and has a Magnesium Alloy body, which is worth quite a bit.  

But for what you'd pay, the Rebel is a fine camera.  And since newegg sells it about $xxxx cheaper than retail, this is the place to get it.  Plus I've never had a bad experience with their shipping.  Always fast and efficient.  Checkmate.

Title: excellent but labotomized
Comments: This is a great move toward lowering the price of digital SLRs but the sad fact is that the Rebel is a software disabled 10D. This begs the question, why not lower the price of the 10D?
